title: Kinda Funny Talks Over The Sony E3 2016 Press Conference (Live Reactions!)
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Kinda Funny give their live reactions to the PlayStation E3 2016 press conference!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
